Waffle Ice Cream Maker: An innovative device that combines the fun of waffles with the sweetness of ice cream. It works by pouring ice cream batter into the waffle iron and cooking it until it's crispy on the outside and creamy on the inside.
Waffle Sandwich Maker: This device takes the classic waffle and turns it into a delicious sandwich. Simply place your favorite fillings between two waffles and cook until crispy and golden brown.

Savory Waffle Maker: Say goodbye to sweet waffles and hello to savory ones with this unique device. It's perfect for making breakfast burritos, grilled cheese sandwiches, and even bacon-wrapped waffles.

Waffle Waffle Maker: This device is perfect for those who love waffles but want to switch things up. It works by making waffles in the shape of waffles, adding an extra layer of fun and creativity to your breakfast or snack time.

Waffle Cookie Maker: Combine the best of both worlds with this device that makes waffle-shaped cookies. Simply mix your favorite cookie dough and pour it into the waffle iron, cooking until crispy and golden brown on the outside and chewy on the inside.
